items.sentence: Neither Tom nor Mary has a lot of respect for their teachers.
Tom told Mary she put up her Christmas decorations too early.
Idiomatic expressions can seldom be translated word for word.
Tom said that he wanted to take a shower before going to bed.
It would be nice if we were able to spend more time together.
I want to get to know you better before I make any decisions.
I wanted to get up early this morning, but I still overslept.
Research requires a lot of energy, but it's worth the effort.
Tom's grandfather told him never to lose his sense of wonder.
Tom knew that Mary wasn't likely to do anything he suggested.
